name: Puff.com Not so Puffy
description:
Just three little tweaks.
IMHO there's WAY too much space at the top of the site being "wasted". This theme hides is so you can more quickly get to the contet.
obsoletion_message: It's causing issues posting... don't use this just yet.
additional_info:
v2 already!

The previous version was affecting the post reply area too - but it seems to be working well for me now.
